group.desc: Name of the morph group the element belongs to

name.desc: Name of the morph inside the group that the element belongs to

model.desc: Current value of the group model; when it becomes the same as the 'name' it triggers the morphing

easing.desc: Timing function for the animation (CSS easing format)

classes.desc: Class names to be added to the destination element during the animation

style.desc: Styles to be added to the destination element during the animation

resize.desc: Use resize instead of scaling during animation

useCSS.desc: Use CSS animations instead of the Animation API

hideFromClone.desc: Hide the spacer for the initial element during animation; Use it if the initial element is not removed or resizing of the space occupied by the initial element is not desired

keepToClone.desc: Keep a clone of the final element visible during animation

tween.desc: Use an opacity tween between the initial and final elements

tweenFromOpacity.desc: If using tween it is the initial opacity of the initial element (will be animated to 0) - the initial element is placed on top of the final element

tweenToOpacity.desc: If using tween it is the initial opacity of the final element (will be animated to 1)

waitFor.desc: Delay animation start for that number of milliseconds, or until a 'transitionend' event is emitted by the destination element, or until the promise is resolved (if the promise is rejected the morphing will abort, but the 'toggle function' was already called)

onEnd.desc: A function that will be called once the morphing is finished; Not called if morphing is aborted

direction.desc: 'to' if the morphing was finished in the final state or 'from' if it was finished in the initial state

arg.desc: x:x2:y:z, where x is the morph element name, x2 is the morph group, y is the animation duration (in milliseconds) and z is the amount of time to wait (in milliseconds) or the 'transitionend' string

resize.desc: Use resize instead of scale transform for morph (forceResize option of the morph function)

useCSS.desc: Use CSS animations for morph (forceCssAnimation option of the morph function)

hideFromClone.desc: Hide the spacer for the initial element (hideFromClone option of the morph function)

keepToClone.desc: Keep the final element visible while morphing (keepToClone option of the morph function)

tween.desc: Use opacity tween morphing between initial and final elements (tween option of the morph function)
